content.text:
# Feature Enhancements

Several new features have been added to ElizaOS:

- Path parameter routes are now enabled for plugins (PR #4335)
- Added option to skip displaying banner if not UTF-8 (PR #4344)
- Reintroduced support for Cloudflare LLM logging and tracking (PR #4354) with added docstrings (PR #4355)
- CLI now suggests upgrades when available (PR #4350)
- Added support for relative character paths (PR #4349)
- Various quality of life improvements for V2 (PR #4348)

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed agent unregistration process with service stop handling (PR #4360)
- Implemented GUI fixes (PR #4358)
- Resolved issues with the TTS API (PR #4352)
- Fixed CLI agent start functionality (PR #4351)
- Added null check for agent (PR #4347)

# Refactoring and Documentation

- Improved Telegram markdown parsing (PR #4279)
- Added documentation for deploying Eliza to TEE with Oasis ROFL app (PR #4334)
- Refactored sidebar and implemented general UI improvements (PR #4353)

# Other Changes

- Fixed .gitignore copying from plugin-starter (PR #4345)
- Added any-provider blog (PR #4356)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on UI improvements, bug fixes, and feature enhancements:

- UI Improvements: PR #4353 by wtfsayo refactors the sidebar and implements general UI improvements, while PR #4348 by odilitime adds V2 quality-of-life improvements.

- Bug Fixes: PR #4359 by michavie addresses agent entity relation issues, PR #4363 by HashWarlock fixes PostgreSQL database issues for Docker containers and updates GitHub actions, and PR #4362 by PixelPil0t1 repairs broken image paths.

- Feature Enhancements: PR #4364 by standujar enables typing indicators for the Discord plugin.

- Dependency Updates: PR #4361 by dependabot bumps pip dependencies across one directory with two updates.

categories.title: Recent Issues in the Eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several users have reported issues with the Eliza platform:

1. Issue #4357: A user (0xopsdev) reported that the EVM plugin (@elizaos/plugin-evm) is not functioning properly.

2. Issue #4339: User cxp-13 reported that the local model on plugin development is not working as expected.

3. Issue #4365: User srpiroliro encountered a JavaScript error where the system cannot read properties of undefined, specifically when trying to access 'sendStandartTweet' from an undefined object.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From April 24-25, 2025, there were 14 new pull requests with 17 merged, along with 1 new issue and 16 active contributors participating. Activity decreased the following day (April 25-26, 2025) with only 3 new pull requests (none merged), 1 new issue, and 7 active contributors.
sources: From 2025-04-24 to 2025-04-25, elizaos/eliza had 14 new PRs (17 merged), 1 new issues, and 16 active contributors.
From 2025-04-25 to 2025-04-26, elizaos/eliza had 3 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 7 active contributors.
